definition: to set up an independent regime/to secede/segmentation/division/fragmentation
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy

sentences.english: The collapse of the Han dynasty was followed by nearly four centuries of rule by warlords.
sentences.chinese: 漢朝滅亡後是長達四個世紀的軍閥割據時代。

sentences.english: The nature of the Territory was not a lease territory, but a concession.
sentences.chinese: 英租威海衛的性質並非“租借地”而是“割據地”。

sentences.english: In the very early days, China was divided and ruled by many kings.
sentences.chinese: 在最初時期，中國曾被許多君王割據。

sentences.english: Our regime tended to exert an ever-growing influence on Hunan and Kiangsi.
sentences.chinese: 此割據對湘贛兩省的影響，則有日益擴大之勢。

sentences.english: An independent regime must be an armed one.
sentences.chinese: 所謂割據，必須是武裝的。

sentences.english: Of the country has gone forever on this land of China.
sentences.chinese: 封建式的割據局面在中國大地上也一去不復返了。

sentences.english: In 1757, the Qing imperial court crushed the long-standing Junggar separatist regime in the Northwest.
sentences.chinese: 1757年，清朝平定長期割據西北的準噶爾政權。

sentences.english: Then the dynasty collapsed in 1912, and China was carved up by warlords.
sentences.chinese: 1912年軍閥割據時代的到來，使它徹底倒塌。

sentences.english: Regional military governors and their supporters were replaced by centrally appointed officials.
sentences.chinese: 地區割據的首領和他們的同夥被中央指定的官員代替。

sentences.english: In the period of five dynasties and ten states, the military governorship of late Tang dynasty continued to develop.
sentences.chinese: 五代十國時期是唐末藩鎮割據的繼續和發展。

sentences.english: The Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period is the continuation and development of the Late Tang Dynasty opposite to the splittism.
sentences.chinese: 五代十國時期是唐末藩鎮割據的繼續和發展。

sentences.english: The Wall represented an artificially divided Germany and a dangerously bifurcated world.
sentences.chinese: 柏林牆代表着被人爲分裂的德國和危險割據的世界。

sentences.english: Her dream is to study in the middle of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 大公國出現於歐洲中世紀封建割據時期。

sentences.english: The Grand Duchy appeared in the feudal separation period during middle ages in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 大公國出現於歐洲中世紀封建割據時期。
